learning_japanese.japanese: もう一度言ってください
learning_japanese.hiragana: もういちどいってください
learning_japanese.explanation: Polite request to have someone repeat what they just said

learning_japanese.japanese: ゆっくり話してください
learning_japanese.hiragana: ゆっくりはなしてください
learning_japanese.explanation: Polite request for someone to speak at a slower pace

learning_japanese.english: How do you say this in Japanese?
learning_japanese.japanese: これは日本語で何と言いますか
learning_japanese.hiragana: これはにほんごでなんといいますか
learning_japanese.romaji: kore wa nihongo de nan to iimasu ka
learning_japanese.explanation: Question to ask how to express something in Japanese, often used while pointing
Polite way to express that you don't understand something

learning_japanese.japanese: これはどういう意味ですか
learning_japanese.hiragana: これはどういういみですか
learning_japanese.romaji: kore wa dou iu imi desu ka
learning_japanese.explanation: Question to ask about the meaning of something
Polite request to have someone write something down for you

word_breakdown.もらえます: moraemasu - can receive (potential form of morau)

asking_directions.english: Excuse me, where is the station?
asking_directions.japanese: すみません、駅はどこですか
asking_directions.hiragana: すみません、えきはどこですか
asking_directions.romaji: sumimasen, eki wa doko desu ka
asking_directions.explanation: Polite way to ask for directions to the train station

asking_directions.english: How do I get to Tokyo Station?
asking_directions.japanese: 東京駅へはどうやって行きますか
asking_directions.hiragana: とうきょうえきへはどうやっていきますか
asking_directions.romaji: toukyou eki e wa dou yatte ikimasu ka
asking_directions.explanation: Question asking for directions or method to reach Tokyo Station

asking_directions.hiragana: ここからとおいですか
asking_directions.explanation: Question to ask if a destination is far from the current location

asking_directions.english: Turn right at the traffic light
asking_directions.japanese: 信号で右に曲がってください
asking_directions.hiragana: しんごうでみぎにまがってください
asking_directions.romaji: shingou de migi ni magatte kudasai
asking_directions.explanation: Direction instruction to turn right at a traffic light

word_breakdown.で: de - particle indicating location of action

asking_directions.japanese: 5分ぐらいまっすぐ行ってください
asking_directions.hiragana: ごふんぐらいまっすぐいってください
asking_directions.explanation: Direction instruction to continue straight for approximately 5 minutes

asking_directions.hiragana: ひだりがわにあります
asking_directions.explanation: Statement indicating something is located on the left side

meeting_new_people.explanation: Standard greeting when meeting someone for the first time

meeting_new_people.hiragana: わたしのなまえは[なまえ]です
meeting_new_people.explanation: Way to introduce your name to someone

meeting_new_people.hiragana: どちらのしゅっしんですか
meeting_new_people.explanation: Polite question to ask about someone's hometown or country of origin

meeting_new_people.japanese: アメリカから来ました
meeting_new_people.hiragana: あめりかからきました
meeting_new_people.explanation: Statement indicating you came from America

word_breakdown.来ました: kimashita - came (past tense of kuru, polite form)

meeting_new_people.english: What do you do for work?
meeting_new_people.japanese: お仕事は何をされていますか
meeting_new_people.hiragana: おしごとはなにをされていますか
meeting_new_people.romaji: oshigoto wa nani wo sarete imasu ka

meeting_new_people.japanese: よろしくお願いします
meeting_new_people.hiragana: よろしくおねがいします
meeting_new_people.explanation: Standard phrase used when meeting someone new or asking for ongoing support
Polite way to ask someone's age
Question to ask about someone's hobbies or interests

shopping.explanation: Common question when asking for the price of an item

shopping.english: Do you have this in a different size?
shopping.japanese: 違うサイズはありますか
shopping.hiragana: ちがうさいずはありますか
shopping.explanation: Phrase to ask if different sizes are available

shopping.japanese: これを試着してもいいですか
shopping.hiragana: これをしちゃくしてもいいですか
shopping.romaji: kore o shichaku shite mo ii desu ka
shopping.explanation: Phrase to ask if you're allowed to try something on

shopping.japanese: クレジットカードは使えますか
shopping.hiragana: くれじっとかーどはつかえますか
shopping.explanation: Asking if a store accepts credit card payments

shopping.english: Can I get a receipt, please?
shopping.explanation: Polite way to ask for a receipt

dining.japanese: 二人用の席をお願いします
dining.hiragana: ふたりようのせきをおねがいします
dining.romaji: futari you no seki o onegaishimasu
dining.explanation: Requesting a table for two people at a restaurant

dining.japanese: メニューを見せてもらえますか
dining.hiragana: めにゅーをみせてもらえますか
dining.explanation: Polite way to ask to see the menu

dining.hiragana: おすすめはなんですか
dining.explanation: Polite way to ask for a recommendation from the staff

dining.japanese: 食べ物アレルギーがあります
dining.hiragana: たべものあれるぎーがあります
dining.explanation: Used to inform staff of food allergies

dining.japanese: お会計をお願いします
dining.hiragana: おかいけいをおねがいします
dining.explanation: Polite way to ask for the bill at a restaurant
